author: Daniel W
comment: Love you devs. Love this app. Using it for couple years. Please add support for tizen watches.   When one has 30+rules, it can get quite confusing and unorganized to find the right rule. Maybe a colour customization/grouping option to categorize our rules? Thanks!

author: Behram Chinoy
comment: I have the paid version. By and large works OK. But definitely not foolproof.   I use it to play chimes every hour. Often does not play the entire tune but barely for a second or so.   Also the screen on off Plugin does not work on either Note 4 or on Asus Laser 2. So have to trigger a regular screen on off app which sort of defeats the purpose of using AutomateIt in the first place!   Closes in the background for Nougat. So none of the rules work. Rules execute only if the app is in the foreground.  There most certainly is scope for a LOT of improvement.  Till then 3 stars.

author: Dan Marsh
comment: A great app all around! Small request: How about Phillips Hue integration? IFTT has it, but it is not as detailed as your app.

reply.author: SmarterApps Ltd
reply.content: Unfortunately, we cannot assist with installation issues as this is handled by the Play Store app. We recommend trying to download again on a stable network. Usually, that fixes these kind of problems.

author: Jeff Haugh
comment: This is a great app. It allows you to do some things beyond the default capabilities. I have a suggestion for an added feature though: allow testing of rules by bypassing the trigger.

author: 6Wa&8o
comment: Appalling tech support! Sent a debug report with problem description 4 months ago and  no reply!? Have been using it for a long time and thought of it to be an excellent app until it developed a problem of triggering  alarming sound on each rule trigger which is impossible to stop. Purchased version.
Previous versions worked well, but now rules fire only rarely.  The rules market is also not working.  No response from support.

author: Paul Eastwood
comment: Use the app to perform many actions automatically when a condition is met.   Would like an option to enable nfc under certain circumstances.

author: Todd Lamm
comment: Doesn't work consistently. I regret paying money for it now. I guess I'm switching to Tasker.

author: Everett Stuckless
comment: App worked great on my galaxy s5 but does not work consistently on my galaxy s7. I often have to restart the app. What's up?
Rules for sound and vibration not working. Android 7.1.2 Wrote to support but no answer 🙁

author: Dinesh Thapa
comment: Works well with time triggered rules. But doesn't work at all with SMS text triggered rules.

author: Darko Milosavljevic
comment: App is excellent. I just want to know how to make my own, new rules so I could upload and for the others. For now only I can change existing rules. Keep on with good work.

author: Jongho Rhee
comment: App does not support DUAL SIM for send SMS actions. It sent msg via 2nd sim. So I got SMS fee. :( I expect a lot of DUAL SIM features.

author: Peter Juras
comment: Piece of garbage, doesn't work at all.
very good app but has development stopped? pity if it has

author: John G
comment: I tried the paid version as a profile manager and liked most of it, except profile switching, and notifications where it got pretty clunky.

author: jake p
comment: Liked the free version,  but the pro version made it useless.  Contacted developer, but got no reply.

author: khawar maqs
comment: A very good app for automation. Developers need to improve it for more features.

author: Chandravijay Singh
comment: Not showing shutdown option in action...unable to use in my car...I want to use it as car gps

author: Tarik M
comment: Amazing app. Use it everyday for automation. Simple to setup as well.

author: Dave Braunstein
comment: Needs to be able to put the app on an SD card.

reply.author: SmarterApps Ltd
reply.content: Since the app runs a background service, it cannot be put on SD card

author: Mr. Raj
comment: Good App for Tasks.

author: Deborah Serfozo
comment: The free version works great, so I bought the pro version. The very simplest of actions will not work. VERY disappointed.  My rule will not dim the screen even when it says the rule is active. Do I need to give the app more permissions? How?

author: John Doe
comment: Please add the option to sync with my Gmail through Google Play Services so I don't have to use Dropbox. Please add the action of being able to disable data, toggle data on/off, or turn data on and the same goes for location so we can find our devices. Also the same for Airplane mode being an action

author: Weslley Leandro
comment: I use this app for a long time but there is one small thing that annoys me a lot.  I have this rule to rotate the device whenever​ YouTube is open but it activates everytime I get a notification. I didn't open the app but still rotates my device. Very irritating.  Besides that, everything is ok.

author: A Google User
comment: I think it screwed up the my ringing of my phone had to reset my phone and I Rolled back to old version it don't hit my GPS behind my back like the latest version does. 😠

author: Hiago Costa
comment: The wifi does twice the trigger about Bluetooth conect. I'm using the Zuk z2 non root Smartphone In the indian stock rom but it takes a lot of Energy, using nougat rom

reply.author: SmarterApps Ltd
reply.content:
Please take a look at the first question on our FAQ page regarding that issue.
http://automateitapp.com/faq-support/

author: Nathan L
comment: I agree the free version had no bugs.  Tried it for a week and it was great. The paid version however doesn't keep sync with my GPS and it bounces in and out. Uninstalled put free back on and started working great again. Needs fixing

author: shonsu34
comment: I tested the free version and all the features I needed worked well.  I've upgraded to the pro version to support this work.  My old favorite solution became abandonware, so I needed something new.  Thanks for a great product!
It works well for the most part. But I gave up on location. It keeps executing when it's not supposed to.

author: Paul Kinahan
comment: Can't manage tethering that's all I wanted it for

author: A Google User
comment: darn, no option for the insanely over-sized bar graph, can we make it even bigger for no reason

author: Drew Lyons
comment: Stopped working altogether. Complete waste of money

author: Johnny Alhwayek
comment: The interface and logic is good, but the battery drain for even time specific rules is insane.

author: Andycel Geroy
comment: I like it it's so easy, but I have issue with action command for turn off mobile data, i have a samsung galaxy s8+

author: Tim Toennies
comment: Is it possible to watch for calendar events in the Outlook mobile client rather than just Google calendar?

author: Erick Arruda
comment: We could have the option to open a document through a shortcut on the main screen.

author: Abdu Elbakry
comment: Its smart and amazing, Worth every penny all it needs is more integrations with other programs and tool .

author: WeRIdo Lee
comment: Gd but can´t unlock screen on 7.0

author: Amit Kumar
comment: Shutdown & Reboot options Trigger  is missing.
